channel.title: Traveling on PYONKICHI BLOG
channel.description: Recent content in Traveling on PYONKICHI BLOG

item.title: Japanese traditional ryokan in Kyoto Toshiharu Ryokan
item.description: Hi, it’s pyonkichi ! The ryokan I stayed at when I traveled to Kyoto before was wonderful, so I will introduce it! Contents About Ryokan About the room Cooking About the bath last About Ryokan “Kyoto Machiya Inn Toshiharu Ryokan” It is a Kyomachiya built in 1909 (Meiji 42), and it seems that it was a mansion of a former wealthy person. Because it was a private residence, there are only 8 rooms, but from each room you can feel the 100-year history of Kyoto.
